en_text: 5x ATK additional damage when matching orbs

jp_skill.name: フラムルージュ
jp_skill.raw_description: ドロップを消した時、攻撃力×5倍の追い打ち。

kr_skill.name: 플레임 루주
kr_skill.raw_description: 드롭을 지운 턴에서 공격력x5배의 추가 공격

na_skill.name: Flamme Rouge
na_skill.raw_description: Inflicts a bonus attack equal to 5x ATK when matching Orbs
